Description.Text: Awarded four silver stars, this charming, smoke-free 19th Century Lake District Town House provides 16 recently refurbished en-suite rooms offering guests relaxing comfortable beds and freshly prepared Cumbrian breakfasts. All rooms have been dressed with bespoke soft furnishings, high quality mattresses, free Wi-Fi, flat screen TV's with Freeview and hard wood furniture. PLEASE NOTE, AS THE PROPERTY IS COMPLETELY NON-SMOKING, A DEEP CLEANING CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED IF YOU SMOKE IN YOUR ROOM. Please note the Check-in times for this property is from 14.00-21.00 hours,Check out is at 10.30. Please note: The hotel can not take group bookings of over 3 rooms.

The Lodge is centrally located in the town of Windermere, originally called Birthwaite until the Kendel and Windermere Rail company built a train station in the village and called it Windermere Station, a name which has been associated with the town and lake since.

Standard Double - The hotel provides 16 relaxing, comfortably furnished en-suite rooms for guests to enjoy bed and breakfast accommodation in Windermere. Rooms have been dressed with bespoke soft furnishings, excelsior deluxe mattresses, 20 inch flat screen Philips TV's with 10 channels.
Family Room - Designed with all modern comforts and excellent facilities to ensure a pleasant, relaxing stay. Room sleeps 2 adults and 2 children in a double bed and bunk beds. A DEEP CLEANING CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED IF YOU SMOKE IN YOUR ROOM.
Superior Double - Spacious accommodation with modern appliances and facilities to ensure a pleasant getaway. One room has a four poster and the other has exposed beams and roof aspects. A DEEP CLEANING CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED IF YOU SMOKE IN YOUR ROOM.
Standard Twin - Designed with all modern comforts and excellent facilities to ensure a pleasant, relaxing stay. A DEEP CLEANING CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED IF YOU SMOKE IN-ROOM.
Standard Single - Including English breakfast, Free Wi-Fi & parking. A cosy & comfortable, stylishly decorated room furnished to an extremely high standard ideal for the solo traveller. A DEEP CLEANING CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED IF YOU SMOKE IN YOUR ROOM.
Junior Suite - Including English breakfast, Free Wi-Fi & onsite parking. Designed with all modern comforts and excellent facilities to ensure a pleasant, relaxing stay. A DEEP CLEANING CHARGE WILL BE APPLIED IF YOU SMOKE IN YOUR ROOM.
